addMoreLiquidity(uint256,uint256).details: Allows governance to manually add liquidity to the buy & burn pool      STATE tokens sourced from SWAP vault, PLS/WPLS from governance wallet      LP tokens are automatically burned

params.stateAmount: Amount of STATE tokens to add (from SWAP vault)
params.wplsAmount: Amount of WPLS tokens to add (optional, from governance wallet)

returns.liquidity: Amount of LP tokens that were burned

createPoolOneClick(uint256,uint256).details: Automatically sources STATE tokens from SWAP vault, only requires PLS/WPLS from governance

params.stateAmount: STATE tokens for initial liquidity (sourced from SWAP vault)
params.wplsAmount: WPLS tokens for initial liquidity (or send PLS as msg.value)

executeFullBuyAndBurn().details: This is the main function governance should use for routine operations

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setupSwapVaultAllowance(uint256).details: Must be called by governance before using createPoolOneClick

params.amount: Amount of STATE tokens to allow this contract to access from SWAP vault

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

addMoreLiquidity(uint256,uint256).notice: Add more liquidity to existing STATE/WPLS pool

calculateOptimalSplit(uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Calculate optimal WPLS split considering pool ratio changes

convertPLSToWPLS().notice: Convert accumulated PLS to WPLS (governance callable)

createPoolOneClick(uint256,uint256).notice: ONE-CLICK Pool Creation: Create STATE/WPLS pool with tokens from SWAP vault

executeBuyAndBurn().notice: Execute optimal buy & burn with dynamic ratio calculation

executeFullBuyAndBurn().notice: ONE-CLICK GOVERNANCE FUNCTION: Convert PLS to WPLS and execute buy & burn in single transaction

rescuePLS(uint256).notice: Emergency function to rescue native PLS (owner only)

rescueTokens(address,uint256).notice: Emergency function to rescue tokens (owner only)

setStateWplsPool(address).notice: Set the STATE/WPLS pool address (governance only)

setupSwapVaultAllowance(uint256).notice: Setup SWAP vault allowance for this contract (governance only)
